posts.post_content:
Looking to compete my run of HoF t206 portraits. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.

SGC 40-60 or PSA 3.5/4.5- Looking for NO creases/NO surface wrinkles/NO paperloss and cards must be centered. Basic backs work best, but open to others as well.

Eddie Collins
John McGraw [no cap]
Addie Joss
Ty Cobb [red]
Ty Cobb [green]
Cy Young **Pending**
Rube Waddell
Bobby Wallace
Walter Johnson
Have a Collins SGC 40, great centering, EPDG, for sale or trade.  Ditto on a Bresnahan PSA 4.  I'd prefer trades that would involve getting a PSA 5 HOFer back (I'd add cash if need be).
Updated list. All PM's and emails have been returned. Thank you.

[quote name="GregMitch34" post=1257941]Have a Collins SGC 40, great centering, EPDG, for sale or trade.  Ditto on a Bresnahan PSA 4.  I'd prefer trades that would involve getting a PSA 5 HOFer back (I'd add cash if need be).[/QUOTE]

Hi Greg. I don't have anything I'm willing to trade, just looking at buying for now.
Updated list. Thanks to those that have helped.
